DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety and efficacy of OPC-6535 (tetomilast) and to determine its optimal dose by once-daily oral administration at 0, 12.5, 25, or 50 mg for 8 weeks in combination with a fixed oral dose of 5-aminosalicylic acid (5-ASA) in patients with active ulcerative colitis.
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Finding Study of OPC-6535 in Patients With Active Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Patients with active ulcerative colitis Patients who have been receiving an oral 5ASA formulation at a fixed regimen and at a fixed dose Either inpatient or outpatient Patients who have a history of intestinal resection (other than appendiceal resection) Patients who have a complication of malignant tumor Female patients who are pregnant, lactating, or possibly pregnant, or who wish to become pregnant during the study period
